definition: surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: Chapter Four is about Yoshino's theory on Japan-US relationship.
sentences.chinese: 第四章考察了吉野作造的日美关系论。

sentences.english: By the end, says Kenji Yoshino, both approaches are shown to be wrong.
sentences.chinese: 到了年底，吉野贤治说，这两种方法都证明是错误的。

sentences.english: Stop Yoshino Kimura, he wanted to use Wang Chunlin Helen of Troy trap.
sentences.chinese: 吉野制止住木村，他想用王春林诱捕小龙女。

sentences.english: Yoshino is one of the most famous garden of Japanese apricot in Tokyo.
sentences.chinese: 吉野是日本东京最有名的杏花园之一。

sentences.english: Chapter One is on the preconditions of Yoshino's idea of foreign policy.
sentences.chinese: 第一章分析了吉野作造的国际政治思想形成的前提。

sentences.english: Yoshino says the play that deals most directly with the law is "The Merchant of Venice."
sentences.chinese: 吉野说，发挥这一交易最直接的法律“威尼斯商人”。

sentences.english: Yoshino says his students benefit from reading Shakespeare.
sentences.chinese: 吉野说，他的学生受益于读莎士比亚。

sentences.english: Sakuzou Yosino belonged to the ideal type among modern…
sentences.chinese: 吉野作造是近代日本知识分子的理想类型。
